group_1.textRight: Eeh...

group_1.textLeft: Are you tired, Chika?

group_1.textRight: Ah... no, @It's not like that...
I just got a little overwhelmed by all the people.
Since I spend most of my time in the countryside...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* You really do like the outdoors.

group_1.textRight: Ever since I was little, I was always playing @outside.
And my hobbies are all outdoors!
Like gardening, or wood carving...

group_1.textLeft: My, that does sound like something you would like.

group_1.textRight: Yup! What kind of hobbies do you have?

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:1.0][chara:305001:cheek_0][chara:305001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:305001:lipSynch_1]I don't really have any...

group_1.textRight: Eh...? @Nothing at all?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I have many types of lessons, but...
But those are all just things I am learning.
The first time in my life I truly had something to @devote myself to.
That was the saint...

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see...
But, if you stay with me for today,
You should start to feel much better!
......[wait:1.0][chara:304701:lipSynch_1][chara:304701:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:eyeClose_1]Maybe.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe?...
In any case, where are we going right now?

group_1.textRight: That's... @Just something you will need to wait to find out!

group_1.textLeft: Okay... I've placed my trust in you.
I've left everything to you Chika.
So, could you escort me @please?

group_1.textRight: Yes, of course!
We're here!

group_1.textLeft: This is... @Mitakihara, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: From here it's just a little bit further.
This way, follow me.
Um... @If we go down this road...

group_1.textLeft: This feels a lot like the first time we met.
Thinking about that day...

group_1.textRight: That day? When we met?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Yes, that's right.
We walked down the mountain path, holding hands.
Talking about the trees, and flowers.
Learning the names, one by one.
I had a wonderful time.

group_1.textRight: Hehe, It's embarrassing when you say it...!

group_1.textLeft: I didn't need to spend money, or do anything big.
Even so, it was fun... @What a strange feeling.

group_1.textRight: Observing nature is fun, and it doesn't cost a single cent!
Each and every time, you can find something new.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see...

group_1.textRight: Yuuna, a Labyrinth...

group_1.textLeft: It's a Witch!

group_1.textRight: Sorry! @Time for a detour!
Let's go take care of that Witch.

group_1.textLeft: Of course, @let's go!
